definitions.definition: An exclamation of pleasure or approval, usually transcribed with an exclamation point.
examples: Our second goal of the match! Yes !

definitions.definition: Response that confirms that the user is paying attention.
Used to ask for more information with a request.

main_definition: An exclamation of pleasure or approval, usually transcribed with an exclamation point.
secondary_definitions: Response that confirms that the user is paying attention.
( interrogative ) Used to ask for more information with a request.
